name: Raise Beast Companion
flavorText: You call out to your beast companion. Though death separates you, the ties of faith and friendship between you can cross any gulf.
text: This ritual allows you to restore life to your slain beast companion. This ritual works only for rangers who have the Beast Mastery class feature. The ritual functions as the Raise Dead ritual, with the following exceptions: You need not have any part of your beast companionâ€™s corpse. The death penalty lasts until you have reached three milestones. A paragon tier beast companion costs 500 gp to raise, and an epic tier beast companion costs 5,000 gp to raise.
